title: BIMA Lanka joins Ceylon Chamber
body_lines: Insurance and Healthcare company BIMA Lanka has joined the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce.
BIMA Lanka Country Director and Manager Ajith Alexander said: “I am very happy that BIMA has become a member of the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce, the premier business forum in Sri Lanka.”

He said BIMA Lanka has been operating in Sri Lanka for nearly a decade and through UK parent Milvik AB has invested in resources and partnerships to serve 1.5 million customers with affordable insurance and healthcare services.
“We aim to deepen our ties with the business community through our participation in the Chamber,” Alexander added.
